title: Raining All The Time?
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>I feel like it’s been raining all day long lately. I wish we could practice outside for once.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Well, it’s the rainy season, so we have to be patient for a bit.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>The rainy season?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Have you never heard of it, Mia-chan? The rainy season is when it rains a lot. It happens because, umm.... Something with cold and warm air....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>What?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ueeeh.... Ruby should’ve studied more.... Ah, it’s probably on the internet! Let’s see.... Look, here. This is how it works.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hmm.... So that’s why. I wonder if it’s like the squalls we have in New York? So, it’s going to be like this for quite some time, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It does clear up once in a while. Days like that feel so nice~. Plants and flowers seem alive and look sparkling green because of the rain. Hydrangeas also look really pretty. Ruby will show you them when it’s sunny!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Really!? I’ll look forward to that.... In the meantime, let’s do our best practicing even when it rains!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah! Let’s do our dance practice together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
